title: Hoshiai no Sora
description: The teen adolescence story revolves around the coming-of-age of boys in a junior high school's soft tennis club, which is on the verge of shutting down. Touma Shinjou asks Maki Katsuragi to join the team for his vaunted abilities, and mentions a summer competition. Katsuragi asks for money in return for joining the team.
genre: [<Genre -> Drama>, <Genre -> School>, <Genre -> Slice of Life>, <Genre -> Sports>]
